title: Crashing randomly
body:
After new patch I have started crashing and this has never happened before. My ping is 23 and i usually get 116-160 fps.
I know my computer is slow but it has been slow for a very long time and this is just happening. Is my computer dying or is it the patch? Overwatch runs fine.

replies.body: I'd like to help you out but need more details on what's actually happening.  What do you mean by crashing and where specifically is it happening?  Are there any error messages?  Let me know!
